name: Diallyldimethylammonium chloride polymer with acrylamide
FoodContactSubstance: Diallyldimethylammonium chloride polymer with acrylamide (CAS Reg. No. 26590-05-6). The copolymers are produced by copolymerizing diallyldimethylammonium chloride with acrylamide in weight ratios ranging from 85/15 to up to but not including 50/50 diallyldimethylammonium chloride/acrylamide.
